title: Rootz
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Raw, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has plenty of vegan choices, plus almost everything on the menu can be made vegan. Serves organic juices and smoothies with coconut or almond milk. Quinoa or organic rice bowls substitute grains for organic greens or organic kale. Spirulina pesto, spirulina guacamole/chips, paninis or wraps available gluten free, raw vegan fudge. Free Wi-Fi. Bar seating. Homey atmosphere with couches and tables.
